cab.content: (This Document Is the Property ofHis Britannic Majesty's Government) 19Y:1SECRET.BATTLE SITUATION - MORNING - 7th MAY, 1918.1. Lust night was comparatively quiet and there is no change in th0 situation this morning *2. Rain is falling in Prance *iGeneral Staff,War Office, S.W.I.7th May. 1918*Issued at 12.20 p.m.Fop the personal information -of the Minister only, - r
